    • addAppointment

      public static void addAppointment(String title, String description, String location, String type, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, int customerId, int userId, int contactId)
      Used to add new appointments into the database
      Parameters:
      title - string of appointment title
      description - string of appointment description
      location - string of appointment location
      type - string of appointment type
      start - LocalDateTime of appointment start date/time
      end - LocalDateTime of appointment end date/time
      customerId - int of customer's id attending the appointment
      userId - int of user's id that created the appointment
      contactId - int of contact's id that will conduct the appointment

    • updateAppointment

      public static void updateAppointment(int appId, String title, String description, String location, String type, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, int customerId, int userId, int contactId)
      Used to update existing appointments in the database
      Parameters:
      appId - int of the appointment id
      title - string of appointment title
      description - string of appointment description
      location - string of appointment location
      type - string of appointment type
      start - LocalDateTime of appointment start date/time
      end - LocalDateTime of appointment end date/time
      customerId - int of customer's id attending the appointment
      userId - int of user's id that created the appointment
      contactId - int of contact's id that will conduct the appointment

    • deleteAppointments

      public static void deleteAppointments(int appId)
      Used to delete the appointment from the database
      Parameters:
      appId - int of the appointment user wishes to delete

    • checkContactBusy

      public static boolean checkContactBusy(LocalDateTime startDateTime, LocalDateTime endDateTime, int contactId)
      Used to check if the contact already has scheduled appointment during selected times.
      Parameters:
      startDateTime - LocalDateTime of the appointment start time entered
      endDateTime - LocalDateTime of the appointment end time entered
      contactId - int of the contact id that will conduct the appointment
      Returns:
      returns true if the associated contact has an appointment scheduled during selected times, otherwise returns false if no appointments are found during selected times.

    • checkContactBusy

      public static boolean checkContactBusy(LocalDateTime startDateTime, LocalDateTime endDateTime, int contactId, int appId)
      Used to check if the contact already has scheduled appointment during selected times not including the appointment id being updated.
      Parameters:
      startDateTime - LocalDateTime of the appointment start time entered
      endDateTime - LocalDateTime of the appointment end time entered
      contactId - int of the contact id that will conduct the appointment
      appId - int of the appointment id being updated
      Returns:
      returns true if the associated contact has an appointment scheduled during selected times, otherwise returns false if no appointments are found during selected times. Not including the current appointment id being updated.

    • checkCustomerBusy

      public static boolean checkCustomerBusy(LocalDateTime startDateTime, LocalDateTime endDateTime, int customerId)
      Used to check if customer already has an appointment scheduled during selected times.
      Parameters:
      startDateTime - LocalDateTime of appointment start time entered
      endDateTime - LocalDateTime of appointment end time entered
      customerId - int of customer id attending the appointment
      Returns:
      returns true if the associated customer has an appointment scheduled during selected times, otherwise returns false if no appointments are found during selected times.

    • checkCustomerBusy

      public static boolean checkCustomerBusy(LocalDateTime startDateTime, LocalDateTime endDateTime, int customerId, int appId)
      Used to check if the customer already has scheduled appointment during selected times not including the appointment id being updated.
      Parameters:
      startDateTime - LocalDateTime of appointment start time entered
      endDateTime - LocalDateTime of appointment end time entered
      customerId - int of the customer attending the appointment
      appId - int of the appointment id being updated
      Returns:
      returns true if the associated customer has an appointment scheduled during selected times, otherwise returns false if no appointments are found during selected times. Not including the current appointment id being updated.

    • getUpcomingAppointments

      public static void getUpcomingAppointments()
      Used to grab any upcoming appointments associated with the user logged in, in the next 15 minutes.

    • getAppointmentsByContact

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAppointmentsByContact(int contactId)
      Used to get all appointments associated with a contact
      Parameters:
      contactId - int of contact id being searched for associated appointments
      Returns:
      returns all contact's associated appointments from the database in an ObservableList array of Appointment objects
